SEARCH
Package com.healthcare.models

Class Invoice

java.lang.Object
com.healthcare.models.Invoice
public class Invoice extends Object
The Invoice class represents an invoice for a patient, including details such as billing information, services provided, insurance claims, and payment details.

  • Constructor Details

    • Invoice

      public Invoice(String invoiceId, LocalDate billingDate, Patient patient, String additionalNotes, int discount, int taxRate)
      Constructs an invoice with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      invoiceId - The unique invoice identifier.
      billingDate - The date the invoice was issued.
      patient - The patient associated with the invoice.
      additionalNotes - Any additional notes for the invoice.
      discount - The discount percentage applied.
      taxRate - The tax rate percentage applied.
